ğŸ‘‰ This repository has been created with the intention of solving all the possible errors that our clients may encounter when using our applications.

ğŸ‘‰ To make this possible, the feedback functionality has been added to the applications.

## ğŸ§¾ How does it work â“

1ï¸âƒ£ Within our applications we go to the feedback button.

2ï¸âƒ£ A widget will open where we can enter the title about our problem.

3ï¸âƒ£ We can take a screenshot and record a video to better show the problem occurred. ğŸ“¸ ğŸ“¹

4ï¸âƒ£ Once we have the capture and the desired video, we proceed to click on the send button. ğŸ“¤

5ï¸âƒ£ A github issue template will open where we can better write the problem in the body of the issue.

6ï¸âƒ£ To better understand what caused the problem, drag the downloaded zip, image and video into the body of the issue. ğŸ“¥

7ï¸âƒ£ Once everything has been entered and the issue has been written, it is time to add the labels. ğŸ·ï¸

8ï¸âƒ£ Finally, all you have to do is click on the submit new issue button. ğŸ“¬

ğŸŒŸ Our engineers will take care of solving the problem ğŸŒŸ

<br>

## ğŸ·ï¸ Labels ğŸ·ï¸


ğŸ“ The labels serve to identify and separate the different problems found, the issue will always contain the label of the application which was being used, 
    the PR (Problem report) label and a label related to the problem.

ğŸ·ï¸ PR, Software, VeronteApp, VeronteFDR , VeronteLink.

<br>

## [![alt embention](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=Badges&message=Embention&color=green&style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/embention/ISS)

ğŸ’¹ For greater visualization of our work, we are going to use the badges, all the issues of each application will contain several badges that will show the problems found, those that have been resolved, those that remain to be done and more data so that the client can see if his reported problem is being addressed
